page.syntax: C preview_report(C report_name [,C filter [,C order [,L modal [,L session_modal [,* options ]]]]])

argument.name: report_name
argument.description: The name of a saved report.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: modal
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = This means that the user does not have to close the Print Preview window before he can move to another window in Alpha Anywhere.
.F. = The preview window opens as a modal dialog box. This means that the user must first close the Print Preview window before he can move to another window in Alpha Anywhere.

argument.name: session_modal
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = This means that any script that calls the PREVIEW_REPORT() method will pause until the Print Preview window is closed. However, the preview window itself is not a modal dialog box. The user is free to select other windows in Alpha Anywhere.
.F. = The script does not pause until the Print Preview window is closed.

page.discussion: PREVIEW_REPORT() creates the selected report and then displays a preview of the report. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
